body:
And I hope this God of an artist gets to live forever 🙌
  

Also if you want a story go read Naruto retard
  

Effort must be put where it matters, also dialogue is sexy and funny and that's enough to give pace to story
I hope we get a translation.
Was 151 posted anywhere else here before? I think this is my first time seeing it and it's great
great style & characters, but marui's dedication to story-free groupsex always kills my interest within 10 pages
Wait... Really ? New manga from this author !?
